borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a rear roof extension, including installation of French doors and a Juliet balcony; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition; installation of new gable end roof above the existing two storey bay to the front elevation, to match neighbouring properties; installation of 2no. rooflights in the front roofslope; replacement of existing front entrance door to a timber Victorian four panel entrance door; installation of French doors and a Juliette balcony to the rear elevation at first floor level; replacement of all windows to the front and rear elevations from uPVC casement style to timber double-glazed sash windows; restoration of the original plasterwork and repair to the pointing of the bricks to the front facade; and retiling of the front garden with feature Victorian tiles true to the style of the building.
